abstract: Investors took Tesla Motors on a joy ride Tuesday, with shares in the electric carmaker closing up more than 40 percent in its first day of trading.

lead_paragraph: Investors took Tesla Motors on a joy ride Tuesday, with shares in the electric carmaker closing up more than 40 percent in its first day of trading.

headline.main: Tesla Leaves I.P.O. Price in the Dust
